name: Maverick's Cloak
min: When there are no allies within 4 tiles around the character, ATK and DEF increase by 4% and Crit increases by 10%.
max: When there are no allies within 3 tiles around the character, ATK and DEF increase by 12% and Crit increases by 20%.

name: True Lens
min: Increases P.ATK by 1%. When attacking from [Highland], Crit increases by 12%.
max: Increases P.ATK by 5%. When attacking from [Highland], Crit increases by 20%.

name: Flying Blade Armguard
min: Sudden Strike: [Instant]. Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 12% of the enemy's HP. Can be used up to 2 times per battle. CD: 3 turns.
max: Sudden Strike: [Instant]. Deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 15% of the enemy's HP. Can be used up to 3 times per battle. CD: 1 turn.

name: Berserk Incense
min: Gains [Rage Awakening]. Effect: Increases Movement by 1 tile and DMG by 10% for 2 turns. CD: 3 turns. Can be used up to 1 time per battle.
max: Gains [Rage Awakening]. Effect: Increases movement by 1 tile and DMG by 20% for 2 turns. CD: 3 turns. Can be used up to 2 times per battle.

name: Crystal Burst Armor
min: Increases HP by 2%. Strike Back deals 10% more DMG.
max: Increases HP by 10%. Strike Back deals 25% more DMG.

name: Cooling Powder
min: Gains immunity to [ðŸš«Healing Received].
max: Increases Healing Received 16% and gains immunity to [ðŸš«Healing Received].

name: Spring Pill
min: [Instant]. Heals the character for 20% HP and dispels 1 [Debuff]. Can be used up to 2 times per battle. CD: 8 turns.
max: [Instant]. Heals the character for 30% HP and dispels 2 [Debuff]. Can be used up to 2 times per battle. CD: 3 turns.

name: Old Scrolls of Auguste
min: [Instant] Grants one other ally 1 random [Level 2 Buff] and [â–²SPD I] for 2 turns. Can be used up to 3 times per battle. Effect CD: 4 turns.
max: [Instant] Grants one other ally 1 random [Level 2 Buff] and [â–²SPD I] for 2 turns. Can be used up to 5 times per battle. Effect CD: 2 turns.

name: Beheading Machete
min: When attacking from [Highland], ATK increases by 6%.
max: When attacking from [Highland], ATK increases by 15%.

name: Irian Combat Bow
min: Increases P.ATK by 1%. Deals 10% more DMG when not in the character's turn.
max: Increases P.ATK by 5%. Deals 20% more DMG when not in the character's turn.

name: Skeleton Staff
min: Increases HP by 2%. Recovers 1 NRG when an ally is defeated in battle. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round.
max: Increases HP by 10%. Recovers 1 NRG when an ally is defeated in battle. The effect can be triggered up to 1 time per round.

name: Doomsday Scythe
min: When launching a [Back Attack], DMG increases by 12%.
max: When launching a [Back Attack], DMG increases by 25%.

name: Ever-Burning Blade
min: After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, gains a 50% chance to inflict [Scorch] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. Deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Scorch].
max: After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, gains a 100% chance to inflict [Scorch] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. Deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Scorch].

name: Senator Swift Sword
min: Increases HP by 3%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts [â–¼Move I] on the target for 1 turn.
max: Increases HP by 15%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts [â–¼Move 1] on the target for 1 turn.

name: Skeleton Spear
min: Increases P.ATK by 2%. Before initiating a single-target attack, additionally deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% P.ATK to the target.
max: Increases P.ATK by 10%. Before initiating a single-target attack, additionally deals [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% P.ATK to the target.

name: Nameless Staff
min: Increases Movement by 1 tile. Increases Crit by 3% if moved no less than 3 tiles before attacking.
max: Increases Movement by 1 tile. Increases Crit by 15% if moved no less than 3 tiles before attacking.

name: Tuning Hammer
min: Increases P.ATK by 5%. Dispels 1 [Buff] from the target before attacking.
max: Increases P.ATK by 10%. Dispels 2 [Buffs] from the target before attacking.

name: Longbow of Martyrs
min: Increases P.ATK by 2%. After single-target Active Attack deals DMG, inflicts [Longbow of Martyrs] for 1 turn. Effect: [Debuff] Increases DMG taken by 10%.
max: Increases P.ATK by 10%. After single-target Active Attack deals DMG, inflicts [Longbow of Martyrs] for 1 turn. Effect: [Debuff] Increases DMG taken by 10%.

name: Star-Raid Crossbow
min: Increases Crit by 6%. If a single-target Active Attack deals Crit DMG, there is a 50% chance to additionally deal 20% of the character's P.ATK as [Piercing DMG] to the target.
max: Increases Crit by 15%. If a single-target Active Attack deals Crit DMG, there is a 100% chance to additionally deal 20% of the character's P.ATK as [Piercing DMG] to the target.

name: Focus Wand
min: When [Unharmed], increases the maximum range of [Single-target Skills] by 1 tile and increases M.ATK by 3% when launching a single-target attack.
max: When [Unharmed], increases the maximum range of [single-target skills] by 1 tile and increases M.ATK by 15% when launching a single-target attack.

name: Resentment Broom
min: Increases [AoE DMG] by 15%. After dealing DMG with an Active Attack, there is a 25% chance to inflict [Life Loss] equal to 20% M.ATK on the target for 1 turn.
max: Increases [AoE DMG] by 15%. After dealing DMG with an Active Attack, there is a 50% chance to inflict [Life Loss] equal to 20% M.ATK on the target for 1 turn.

name: Space-time Ring
min: [Instant] Teleports the character behind an ally and increases ATK by 2%.
max: [Instant] Teleports the character behind any ally and increases ATK by 10%.

name: Roaring Flint
min: [Instant] Deals fire [Piercing DMG] equal to 10% of the character's HP to all enemies within 2 tiles around the target. Can be used up to 1 time per battle.
max: [Instant] Deals fire [Piercing DMG] equal to 20% of the character's HP to all enemies within 2 tiles around the target. Can be used up to 2 time per battle. CD: 3 turns.

name: Denial Hammer
min: When charging, deals 5% more DMG. If targets who have lower HP than the character are knocked back, pushes them back by 1 more tile.
max: When charging, deals 25% more DMG. If targets who have lower HP than the character are knocked back, pushes them back by 1 more tile.

name: Mysterious Deflection Device
min: Decreases the DMG from [Ranged Attacks] by 4%.
max: Decreases the DMG from [Ranged Attacks] by 12%.

name: Mystery Guardian
min: When attacked from the [front], gains 5% bonus P.DEF and [ðŸš«Defense Attribute Debuff].
max: When attacked from the [front], gains 25% bonus P.DEF and [ðŸš«Defense Attribute Debuff].

name: Fancy Hat
min: Gains [Immunity to Disrupt]. When [Healthy], M.DEF increases by 3%.
max: Gains [Immunity to Disrupt]. When [Healthy], M.DEF increases by 15%.

name: Newborn Blade
min: Increases HP by 5%. Grants bonus P.ATK equal to 3% HP at the start of the battle.
max: Increases HP by 10%. Grants bonus P.ATK equal to 6% HP at the start of the battle.

name: Void Stab
min: Increases Crit by 3%. After using the skill, gains 1 stack of [Void]. Effect: Increases Crit DMG by 5% and can stack up to 6 times. The effect lasts until the end of the next 1 turn.
max: Increases Crit by 15%. After using the skill, gains 1 stack of [Void]. Effect: Increases Crit DMG by 5% and can stack up to 6 times. The effect lasts until the end of the next 2 turns.

name: Double-Sided Halberd
min: Increases P.ATK by 5%. For each target hit when attacking, increases DMG by 3%, up to 9%.
max: Increases P.ATK by 5%. For each target hit when attacking, increases DMG by 38%, up to 24%.

name: Pendant Halberd
min: Increases HP by 2%. Before taking a single-target attack, gains 10% bonus ATK and DEF.
max: Increases HP by 10%. Before taking a single-target attack, gains 10% bonus ATK and DEF.

name: Brutal Axe
min: Increases HP by 3%. When attacking, if the enemy's HP percentage is higher than the character, ignores 20% of the target's DEF.
max: Increases HP by 10%. When attacking, if the enemy's HP percentage is higher than the character, ignores 40% of the target's DEF.

name: Hollow Axe
min: Increases DEF by 5%. Gains bonus P.ATK equal to 5% P.DEF and M.DEF at the start of the battle.
max: Increases DEF by 10%. Gains bonus P.ATK equal to 10% P.DEF and M.DEF at the start of the battle.

name: Starry Sky Heritage
min: Increases HP by 5%. Grants bonus M.ATK equal to 3% HP at the start of the battle.
max: Increases HP by 10%. Grants bonus M.ATK equal to 6% HP at the start of the battle.

name: Reorganized Cube
min: Increases Healing Effect by 3%. When using a skill on an ally, additionally dispels 1 [Debuff].
max: Increases Healing Effect by 15%. When using a skill on an ally, additionally dispels 1 [Debuff].

name: Feast Axe
min: If the target's HP percentage is lower than the character's when attacking, increases ATK by 10%. The character recovers 20% HP when defeating an enemy. CD: 3 turns.
max: If the target's HP percentage is lower than the character's when attacking, increases ATK by 20%. The character recovers 35% HP when defeating an enemy. CD: 1 turns.

name: Shroud of Void
min: [Instant] Decreases Magical DMG taken by 50%, which can be activated up to 1 time. The effect lasts for 2 turns and can be used up to 1 time per battle.
max: [Instant] Decreases Magical DMG taken by 70%, which can be activated up to 3 times. The effect lasts for 2 turns and can be used up to 1 time per battle.

name: Luxite Greatshield
min: Gains a [Physical Shield] equal to 40% HP for 2 turns. This effect cannot be dispelled. Can be used up to 1 time per battle
max: Gains a [Physical Shield] equal to 60% HP for 2 turns. This effect cannot be dispelled. Can be used up to 2 times per battle. CD: 3 turns.

name: Whale Hunter
min: After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, gains a 50% chance to inflict [Infection] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. The character deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Infection].
max: After dealing DMG with single-target active attacks, gains a 100% chance to inflict [Infection] on the target, which can be triggered up to 1 time per round. The character deals 20% more DMG to the enemies with [Infection].

name: Meteor Line
min: Increases P.ATK by 1%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts 1 random [Level 1 Debuff] for 2 turns.
max: Increases P.ATK by 5%. After dealing DMG with single-target attacks, inflicts 2 random [Level 1 Debuff] for 2 turns.

name: Guardian's Will
min: Increases HP by 5%. When having [Shield], increases DEF by 20%.
max: Increases HP by 10%. When having [Shield], increases DEF by 40%, and decreases DMG taken by 10%..

name: Melee Mega Crossbow
min: Minimum Range -1, increases DMG by 16%. For each 1 additional tile away from the target (Distance for Adjacent Tiles counts as 0), DMG dealt decreases by 8%, up to a reduction of 32%.
max: Minimum Range -1, increases DMG by 32%. For each 1 additional tile away from the target (Distance for Adjacent Tiles counts as 0), DMG dealt decreases by 5%, up to a reduction of %20.

name: The Silent Guard
min: When actively attacked, DEF increases by 10%. The next attack deals 15% more DMG.
max: When actively attacked, DEF increases by 30%. The next attack deals 25% more DMG.

name: Diffusing Prism
min: Increases MATK by 5%. Upon casting AoE Attack, for each 1 target hit, increases [Magical DMG] and [Piercing DMG] dealt by 5%, up to 10%.
max: Increases MATK by 10%. Upon casting AoE Attack, for each 1 target hit, increases [Magical DMG] and [Piercing DMG] dealt by 10%, up to 20%.

name: Origin Hourglass
min: Increases P.ATK and M.ATK by 2%. Grants immunity against [â–¼Move] and [â–¼SPD].
max: Increases P.ATK and M.ATK by 8%. Grants immunity against [â–¼Move] and [â–¼SPD].

name: Hunter's Intuition
min: When [Alert] is triggered, deals 5% more DMG. Moreover, if a foe uses a skill within range of the [Alert], it will also be triggered.
max: When [Alert] is triggered, deals 25% more DMG. Moreover, if a foe uses a skill within range of the [Alert], it will also be triggered.

name: Precision-forged Dagger
min: When actively attacking enemies with [â–¼Move], P.ATK increases by 3%.
max: When actively attacking enemies with [â–¼Move], P.ATK increases by 15%.

name: Dueling Dagger
min: When attacked from [front or side], P.DEF increases by 5%.
max: When attacked from [front or side], P.DEF increases by 25%.

name: Ceremonial Knife
min: When launching a [Back Attack], Crit increases by 12%.
max: When launching a [Back Attack], Crit increases by 20%.

name: Sharpe Blade Spear
min: When actively attacking enemies with 3 or more [Debuffs], P.ATK increases by 3%.
max: When actively attacking enemies with 3 or more [Debuffs], P.ATK increases by 15%.

name: Guardian Spear
min: Increases HP by 4%.
max: Increases HP by 12%.

name: Armor-piercing Spear
min: When attacking enemies with a [Shield], ATK increases by 6%.
max: When attacking enemies with a [Shield], ATK increases by 15%.

name: Formidable Axe
min: When attacking from [Highland], Crit increases by 5%.
max: When attacking from [Highland], Crit increases by 25%.

name: Antimagic Axe
min: After actively attacking and dealing DMG, has a 60% chance to dispel 1 [Buff] on the target. CD: 2 turns.
max: After actively attacking and dealing DMG, has a 100% chance to dispel 2 [Buffs] on the target. CD: 1 turn.

name: Balanced Heavy Axe
min: When [Healthy], ATK increases by 6%.
max: When [Healthy], ATK increases by 12%.

name: Vlderian Longbow
min: Before a single-target attack, if the distance to the target is 4 tiles or more, Crit increases by 5%.
max: Before a single-target attack, if the distance to the target is 4 tiles or more, Crit increases by 25%.

name: Steel Crossbow
min: Attacks ignore 12% of the target's DEF.
max: Attacks ignore 25% of the target's DEF.

name: Hunting Bow
min: After dealing DMG, there is a 25% chance to inflict [â–¼Move I] on the target for 1 turn.
max: After dealing DMG, there is a 50% chance to inflict [â–¼Move I] on the target for 1 turn.

name: Gazing Orb
min: Deals 6% more DMG when performing a single-target attack.
max: Deals 15% more DMG when performing a single-target attack.

name: Explosive Crystal
min: Increases [AoE DMG] by 6%.
max: Increases [AoE DMG] by 15%.

name: Ink Totem
min: Healing Effect increases by 5%.
max: Healing Effect increases by 10%.

name: Rejection Mask
min: Magical DMG taken decreases by 20%. CD: 5 turns.
max: Magical DMG taken decreases by 30%. CD: 2 turns.

name: Thorny Ring
min: When [Injured], increases ATK by 6%.
max: When [Injured], increases ATK by 12%.

name: Evergreen Pendent
min: When healed, there is a 50% chance to gain 1 random [Level 2 Attribute Buff], which lasts for 2 turns.
max: When healed, there is a 100% chance to gain 1 random [Level 2 Attribute Buff], which lasts for 2 turns.

name: Spring Tonic
min: [Instant]. Heals 30%% HP. Can be used up to 1 time per battle.
max: [Instant]. Heals 45% HP. Can be used up to 1 time per battle.

name: Unique Coat
min: Physical DMG taken decreases by 20%. CD: 5 turns.
max: Physical DMG taken decreases by 30%. CD: 2 turns.

name: Coexist Armor
min: DMG taken decreases by 5% when [Healthy].
max: DMG taken decreases by 10% when [Healthy].

name: Mist Necklace
min: Before being actively attacked, inflicts 1 random [Level 1 Debuff] on the attacker for 2 turns. CD: 5 turns.
max: Before being actively attacked, inflicts 2 random [Level 1 Debuff] on the attacker for 2 turns. CD: 2 turns.

name: Disaster Bottle
min: Catastrophe: [Instant]. Inflicts 1 random [Level 2 Attribute Debuff] on the enemy. CD: 4 turns.
max: Catastrophe: [Instant]. Inflicts 2 random [Level 2 Attribute Debuff] on the enemy. CD: 2 turns.

name: Cornucopia Series
min: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 40% chance to recover 2 Energy. If the character is [Dying], there is a 40% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 3 turns.
max: At the start of the turn, if the character is [Healthy], there is a 80% chance to recover 2 Energy. If the character is [Dying], there is a 80% chance to recover 30% HP. CD: 2 turns.
